item.title: cd to the directories you "frequently and recently" use pretty easily with Z
item.description: Z is a command line tool that helps you to cd to directories you use with just a few key stores. It manages this by tracking the directories you visit, and weighting them by how frequently and how recently they have been visited. I have been using it happily for a long time, and now I think that I can recommend it to other people. It uses a term frecent for ranking directories.
